title.value: Damping signatures at JUNO, a medium-baseline reactor neutrino oscillation experiment
title.justification: The title of the paper is clearly stated.
title.quote: Damping signatures at JUNO, a medium-baseline reactor neutrino oscillation experiment

extractions.description: The damping signatures are motivated by various new physics models, including quantum decoherence, ùúà3 decay, neutrino absorption, and wave packet decoherence.

type.justification: The research conducted is empirical as it is based on experimental data analysis.
type.quote: We study damping signatures at the Jiangmen Underground Neutrino Observatory (JUNO), a medium-baseline reactor neutrino oscillation experiment.

name.justification: The paper studies damping signatures at JUNO, a neutrino oscillation experiment.
